newsitem.title: USA: Group cuts stake in Audiovox.
newsitem.headline: Group cuts stake in Audiovox.

text.p: A group including SC Fundamental Value Fund LP said Tuesday it cut its stake in Audiovox Corp to 994,633 common shares or 6.6 percent from 1the 4.9 percent previously held.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include the sale of 1,237,500 common shares between November 27 and December 20 at prices ranging from $5.1298 to $5.939 per share.
The Hauppauge, New York company markets and supplies a diverse line of automotive accessories, such as automobile sound equipment and cellular telephones, as well as consumer electronic products.
